alert.note: Alert for Delaware; Franklin; Madison; Union (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 23 at 4:39PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF FRANKLIN, WESTERN DELAWARE, NORTHEASTERN MADISON AND SOUTHEASTERN UNION COUNTIES IN CENTRAL OHIO THROUGH 515 PM EDT... At 439 PM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was located over Dublin, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Hail may cause minor damage to outdoor objects. Locations impacted include... Columbus, Dublin, Westerville, Reynoldsburg, Grove City, Delaware, Upper Arlington, Gahanna, Hilliard, Marysville, Worthington, Bexley, Powell, Groveport, Plain City, Minerva Park, New California, Polaris, Ohio State University and Easton. This includes the following Interstates... I-70 in Ohio between mile markers 89 and 111. I-71 in Ohio between mile markers 95 and 125. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a sturdy building. To report hazardous weather conditions, go to our website at weather.gov/iln and submit your report via social media, when you can do so safely.
